channel.title: Pokemon ROM Hack
channel.description:
Okay, so my girlfriend is a huge pokemon nerd and she absolutely loves Pokemon Sapphire. Now, I've experimented with rom hacking and so far I've gone as much as creating maps and changing around portions of maps. I want to fill the ROM with as much memories of us together and her life growing up while keeping the pokemon feel.
++ or --? Could the idea be revised a bit more? Does anyone here have extensive knowledge with rom hacking? I've already told her the idea and she loves it.

item.title: Pokemon ROM Hack
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:21, topic:408292”][quote author=_s link=topic=509577.msg3697985#msg3697985 date=1312568736]

No, ruby as the programming language.

ugh whatever, why would you need to build from the ground up if you’ve got a rom to base it on. everything’s pretty much done for you…

Why does anyone re/create a game? It’s just adding more shit to it with the possibility of breaking it overall.

wait how are you going to use Ruby to hack the rom
[/quote]

You’re misunderstanding. A completely new game (based off sprites and the engines that pokemon uses now) can be made using ruby.

I merely mentioned it because after I finish with this, I might go in depth with computer science and game development and try my hand at that. Everyone starts from there and why not from a simple game based around something that person enjoyed, in my case Pokemon.[/quote]
oh ok, that’s cool.

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon ROM Hack
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote="_s, post:20, topic:408292"][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=509577.msg3697803#msg3697803 date=1312557616]
No, ruby as the programming language.

ugh whatever, why would you need to build from the ground up if you’ve got a rom to base it on. everything’s pretty much done for you…

Why does anyone re/create a game? It’s just adding more shit to it with the possibility of breaking it overall.
[/quote]
wait how are you going to use Ruby to hack the rom[/quote]

You’re misunderstanding. A completely new game (based off sprites and the engines that pokemon uses now) can be made using ruby.

I merely mentioned it because after I finish with this, I might go in depth with computer science and game development and try my hand at that. Everyone starts from there and why not from a simple game based around something that person enjoyed, in my case Pokemon.

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon ROM Hack
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Well I never personally got good with changing around maps intensely. I was able to edit how they looked, add new pokemon to encounter etc, but never changed around the people/events.

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon ROM Hack
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:408292”]I have a kit i have put together for the ruby/sapphire/emerald roms. You can change the almost anything within the rom with these. May be a bit but ill post a link to a dl for them soon.

EDIT: After the computer failing to startup 4 times I has to take it all apart (ouch, voided warrenty :() and get all of the dust off, as well as clean all connections (6 months old??) to get it to completely start up. Anyways, here is a link.
http://up.ht/plCpnh

Also, just a small question before you start doing this. How long have you been together? Find some of the interesting places you have been and re-create them (you may need to re-visit and take some pictures) within the game. Shouldn’t be too hard. Maybe change a few item names around to match certain memorable items you have bought eachother. There are many idea’s for something like this to be done. Just don’t go too in depth with it otherwise you will loose the pokemon feel.[/quote]
wow, thanks for these, ive been wanting to make a rom hack for pkmn for a while now, based around Deoxys… and mebe i can now.

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon ROM Hack
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

LilXCj:

Thanks. She’s cheated on me once but she ultimately regrets it (because the guy she cheated on me with sucked at sex). I’ve already gotten over that part. Most of the tools in that pack are outdated but I’ll find a use for them. PokeScript is also outdated because the compiling process is a lot more different.

The tools were gathered a while ago, yes, but they still work

item.title: Pokemon ROM Hack
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

For the relation advice, forgive and forget. That’s the best I can tell you, I lost a girl I really loved by not forgiving her for some things.

For the Pokemon ROM, add the first place you guys met.

And to modify the ROMS, i don’t have any experience. Did a quick google search on it though,
http://www.ipodwizard.net/showthread.php?t=39709

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon ROM Hack
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Aah so its been a while. Well that may be quite the interesting game. I personally lost a gf after 2 years 2 months because I caught her (her phone called me) and all I herd was heavy breathing and a bit of choking. Waiting around 15 minutes before calling back and breaking up with her. That was the 4th time I knew of her cheating on my. I actually, over the 2 years after, have found out of 6 other events, and another that almost happened. Anyways, congrats on staying with her that long. Put alot of thought into this and see how its goes, just don’t go and ruin the pokemon feel.

Read full topic
